content.en: Efficient algorithms: Algorithms are being used in various scientific fields to provide unique information and efficient calculations. For example, in chemistry and physics, algorithms based on density functional theory are routinely used for electronic structure calculations. Many-body perturbation theory and complete active space self-consistent field methods are also employed to obtain accurate results in surface and adsorption energies, as well as large molecule calculations. These algorithms enable scientists to study and understand complex systems more effectively.
content.da: Effektive algoritmer: Algoritmer bliver brugt inden for forskellige videnskabelige områder for at levere unik information og effektive beregninger. For eksempel, inden for kemi og fysik bliver algoritmer baseret på tæthetsfunktionalteori rutinemæssigt brugt til beregninger af elektroniske strukturer. Mange-legeme forstyrrelsesteori og komplette aktive rum selvkonsistent feltemetoder anvendes også for at opnå nøjagtige resultater i overflade- og adsorptionsenergier samt store molekyleberegninger. Disse algoritmer gør det muligt for forskere at studere og forstå komplekse systemer mere effektivt.
